body.name: WESECUU Light Bulb Security Camera, 2.4G/5G WiFi Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor Indoor for Home Security, 2-Way Talk, Human Detection, Color Night Vision, Compatible with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Easy Installation - Bluetooth Qucik Connecttion】lightbulb camera outdoor is easy to install and operate. Simply screw it into a light socket and open the bluetooth of your phone then follow the in-app instructions to connect to 2.4GHz/5G WiFi. No additional power supply is required, making the installation process effortless. The smart bulb camera needs to be inserted into the E27 light socket (100V~240V). The lightbulb security camera is equipped with a light socket adapter.

【360°Coverage & Motion-Tracking Alerts】Motion tracking supports wesecuu 360 wireless bulb security camera to accurately detect objects and automatically track them in a super large range of Pan 355°and Tilt 90°vertically. After enabling, home security cameras will begin to automatically record and follow the object in motion, and "Alarm" when needed.

【2K FHD & Color Night Vision】Light bulb cameras, with 2K Ultra resolution, provides superior image quality that allows you to easily recognize faces and details. The security light bulb camera has six floodlights and six IR lights, which provide clear, colored images even in complete darkness. You can easily monitor your home or business during the day or night, and easily recognize any potential threats or intruders.

【2-Way Talk & Smart Human Detection】Wifi security camera with built-in microphone and speaker, wireless light bulb cameras allow you to communicate with the family anytime and hear visitors in real-time. If you have Human Detection turned on in the app, the outside camera wireless will only push an alert when it detects the entire human form. It helps send alarm notifications more accurately and reduces interference.

【24/7 Recording & Warm Tips】The security light bulb camera outdoor supports 24/7 recording to the cloud or a TF card (up to 128GB, not included), so you never miss a moment. It will send you real-time notifications when it detects any motion, maximizing the security of your home and property. As long as you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem as quickly as we can.

Can this home security lightbulb camera use with the 5G wifi? Yes, this light bulb security camera can use the 2.4G and 5G wifi. Can this smart bulb camera playback? Yes, this WESECUU 360 wireless bulb security camera has 24/7 recording, so you can see the playback with an SD Card (not included) or via subscribe the cloud storage. The App (camera) supports multiple users? Yes, the App supports multiple users by sharing function, and the APP can also add multi device. Does the wireless 360 outdoor security camera light bulb have night vision, is night vision clear enough? Yes, this wifi security camera has a full color night vision with 2K Ultra resolution, provides superior image quality even at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera and great connection
reviews.reviewText: Best security camera for the price and easy to set up and use. The picture is clear and so is the audio. I have an sd card in it and have had no problems. I’ve also had it installed for a few months in Florida, so it’s been through a few light tropical storms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive indoor/outdoor security camera that offers continuous recording to supplement my Ring and Arlo cameras. Happened to see this Wesecuu light bulb security camera for around twenty bucks (ok, thirty bucks, because I had to buy a SD card) on Amazon, thought I give it a try. This security camera looks like a light bulb, just had to screw it into an existing light fixture after easy setup, and that’s it! So, great price, easy setup, super clear video (day & night), 360 degree of motion tracking, continuous recording with sd card, it’s the best security camera I’ve found for the price, so happy with it, I purchased another for the side yard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product,Very Reliable, Works In Very Hott and Freezing Temperatures
reviews.reviewText: Love The Product,Very Reliabke, Great Quality For The Price And Awsome 5k Picture. Also Has A Easy To Understand,Very Detailed Free App.. Thankyou

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slow to detect
reviews.reviewText: The camera is slow to detect motion though. It takes too long for it to kick on! I’ve tried every setting possible but it still takes us standing under it waving our arms for several seconds before the light and siren kicks on. Apart from that, it was easy to set up and everything else about it is acceptable for the price. The picture quality is clear enough, the light is bright enough, and the night vision works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Value and Quality Security Coverage
reviews.reviewText: This light bulb camera is very easy to install and operate. And the camera picture quality is amazing! The camera can be repositioned remotely by using your phone app with very little effort. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super clear picture
reviews.reviewText: The quality of these is great. Very maneuverable and super easy to check the areas I have covered.I didn’t rate them higher because they lose connectivity every time I’m not actively using them, and it takes minutes to reconnect. Not sure if my internet is the problem, but it’s not good.The other issue is the SD cards. I bought and installed them, and I can see past events, but only a single image for each. If I try to see a video, I get a message that no video is available.Maybe I’m missing something?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Buy this brand!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so pleased with the WESECUU Light Bulb Security Camera! Setup was a snap! It operates off the power of my front porch light socket (How cool is that!), and the app is great! I can scan the entire street along my front yard and see my garbage cart and mailbox. No more wondering if trash has been emptied or mail delivered. I can easily point it down to my porch and front door to see packages, visitors, etc. If I lose my WiFi signal, it reconnects immediately once service is restored. I plan to replace my awful back deck camera (described below) with the WESECUU solar powered model so I can use the same app. I absolutely recommend this brand!I'm new to security cameras, and my first experience was very disappointing. I purchased (from a home improvement store) a stationary, solar powered camera for my back deck and driveway. There's no light socket or power outlet available, and I prefer solar power to battery packs that have to be removed to charge. It only works so-so, and if it disconnects from my WiFi it takes a LOT of work to reconnect. At one point, I almost threw it away! And, the app is AWFUL! It also cost me several times more than this one, and three times more than the WESECUU solar powered!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Day And Night.
reviews.reviewText: The camera is good for the price. Our vehicles have been broken into twice, so I wanted to set up an outside camera. The day quality is really good. The night vision is decent. The camera does have a ring light around the lense that is activated when motion is detected, which helps a bit, but unable to see license plates or faces. Like I said, it’s good for the price. I just want to catch these thieves.
